page.title: 15CARNIVAL AND PANCAKE RACES.
page.content: Every September at South Petherton recreation ground we have a fair it lasts until the carnival night. The rides that we get are, the Bumper cars,and the Waltsers, Swinging Chairs, Cyclones, Roundabouts and the Noah's Ark. On the last night of the fair we have a Carnival. There are floats and people dress up. Floats are just lorrys that go round the streets and people dress up and ride on them. They also decorate the lorries. We have a Carnival Queen and there is one Princess and one attendant. There are girls who march with batons called Majorettes. There's also a band. Every Shrove Tuesday there are pancake races in St.James' Street South Petherton There are different ages for each race. After, there is a Shriving service at the Parish church where they give out prizes.
